DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate effect `` combined probiotic '' improve gastrointestinal function intestinal bacteria flora
DOC.brief_title: Effects Probiotics Improving Gastrointestinal Function Intestinal Bacterial Flora
DOC.detailed_description: Probiotics know improve gastrointestinal function . This single-blind placebo control clinical study . We perform gastrointestinal function questionnaire collect stool baseline data study ( 0-week ) . Then healthy subject randomize two group . Experimental : probiotic 1 pack bid 3 week . Probiotics : ( AB-kefir ) ：Lactobacillus acidophilus , Bifidobacterium longum , Lactobacillus paracasei , Lactobacillus rhamnosus , Lactobacillus fermentum , Streptococcus thermophilus , Lactobacillus helveticus , Kluyveromyces fragilis . Other component include starch , oligosaccharide , yeast powder , superior standard spice， calcium pantothenate， VitB1， VitB12， biotin folic acid . Placebo group : placebo 1 pack bid 3 week . Placebo : Except probiotic ( AB-kefir ) , component study group . Then gastrointestinal function questionnaire stool collection perform end 1st , 2nd , 3rd , 4th week start study .
DOC.criteria: Healthy people age 20 40 year 1 . People use probiotic medication food inhibit bacteria growth within one month study 2 . People active infection 3 . People active chronic gastrointestinal disease 4 . People diarrhea within two week study 5 . People drug alcohol abuser 6 . People poor compliance
